question: You are studying for a qualification, and you would like some off work to complete it.Write a letter to your manager. In your letter:- ask for some time off to complete a qualification.- Suggest what you will do later at work if you have time off.- Say how the qualification helps your job or company.
text: I hope you are well and in our best health. I am writing this letter to request you a fortnight off work on 16 May in order to complete my Master’s degree in Business Administration, to be more precise, I must submit my graduation thesis by 30 May.
Unfortunately, all my usual leave had been used up. However, I will do some internal arrangement with my colleagues to cover it. Therefore, there is no way working influence with my absent.
Addition, I would check e email daily and be available for emergency phone calls.
Beside, once I resume, I would endeavor to come into the office earlier than usual work and work on Sat to catch up on my thing I had missed.

Last but not least, I realise my temporary absent could be an inconvenience to you and the rest of the team. Nonetheless, in long term our firm will benefit from my research. Furthermore, my expertise will assist us look for potential client and boost sales.
Thank you for your time and consideration.
I look forward to receive my leave application approved.
